definition: woven mat/seat/banquet/place in a democratic assembly/classifier for banquets, conversations etc
even if you build a thousand-league awning for it, every banquet must come to an end (idiom)
pinyin: qian1 li3 da1 chang2 peng2 , mei2 you3 bu4 san4 de5 yan4 xi2
containing_words.word: 千里搭长棚，没有不散的宴席

definition: see 天下沒有不散的筵席|天下没有不散的筵席[tian1 xia4 mei2 you3 bu4 san4 de5 yan2 xi2]
pinyin: tian1 xia4 mei2 you3 bu4 san4 de5 yan4 xi2

sentences.english: I wonder why Tatai bothered to set such a feast for me?
sentences.chinese: 奇怪，塔塔伊为什么要费事给我摆宴席？

sentences.english: Our restaurant caters (for) high grade feasts and local-flavour snacks of south China.
sentences.chinese: 本店承办高档宴席和南方风味小吃。

sentences.english: Cook a Polynesian feast or an ancient Roman banquet.
sentences.chinese: 做一桌波里尼西亚宴席或古罗马盛宴。

sentences.english: But at a dinner-party one would rather be a mosquito than a mute.
sentences.chinese: 但在晚宴席上，人们宁愿做一只蚊子也不愿沉默寡言。

sentences.english: The knights rose from the banquet table to pledge the king.
sentences.chinese: 众武士从宴席上起立，举杯祝国王健康。

sentences.english: Yes, we still have a private room for banquets.
sentences.chinese: 是的，我们还有一间雅座可以安排宴席。

sentences.english: That caterer furnishes both food and maids.
sentences.chinese: 那个备办宴席者供给食物与招待。

sentences.english: Treasure discontent less angry, dinner more than with silver paper.
sentences.chinese: 宝少不满怒气冲冲，宴席二人更比并烧银纸。

sentences.english: Most Chinese people have the tradition of making toasts at banquets.
sentences.chinese: 中国的宴席中一般都有敬酒的习俗。

sentences.english: One of the most significant functions of a chief was to organise and pay for feasts.
sentences.chinese: 首领的一个重要的职责之一就是为宴席付款。

sentences.english: The famous roast Beijing duck is on the third floor in this Food Center.
sentences.chinese: 本饮食中心的二楼是中华乐舞与宫庭宴席。

sentences.english: As a banquet table and an ideal day-to-day visit to the pro-dishes and the gift Jiapin visit friends.
sentences.chinese: 成为宴席及日常餐桌的理想菜肴和访亲探友馈赠佳品。

sentences.english: I'm bound to come your birthday party tomorrow night.
sentences.chinese: 我明天晚上一定会去你的生辰宴席。

sentences.english: Chapter Three is a retrospect of the historical backdrop of the changes.
sentences.chinese: 第三章阐述了西北回族宴席曲流变的历史文化背景。

sentences.english: What different responses and consequences are there to the king's invitation to a wedding banquet?
sentences.chinese: 人对国王娶亲宴席邀请有那些不同的反应与后果？

sentences.english: Thank you for preparing such a splendid dinner specially for us.
sentences.chinese: 十分感谢为我们准备这么丰盛的宴席。

definition: to entertain (for dinner)/to invite to dinner
banquet where guests arrive at various times and are served with food as they arrive
food and drink/food to accompany wine
